task_background: Prepare the media production studio for an upcoming live recording session by organizing equipment, cleaning, and ensuring all devices are functional.

tasks.task_description: Place the master_control_keyboard_1 on the editing_desk_1.
Find the white label printer that is dirty and clean it.
Use the charger_1 to recharge the camera_1.
Find the black, professional camera that is not charged and use the charger_1 to recharge it.
